Gift to Kim Jong Il from Norodom Sihanouk
       Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from Cambodian King Norodom Sihanouk on an official goodwill visit to Korea.   The King conveyed the gift to Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, today.

articles.title: Foreign diplomatic corps visits Korean Revolution Museum
Events held on 5th anniversary of  Kim Il Sung's passing away
articles.content:
Foreign diplomatic corps visits Korean Revolution Museum 
    Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Foreign diplomatic corps here Tuesday visited the Korean Revolution Museum on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of the President Kim Il Sung's passing away.   They looked round the photos, revolutionary relics and materials showing the revolutionary activities of the President who devoted himself to the people to the last moment of his life.   Doyen of the corps Shaher Mohammed Abdlah, Palestinian  ambassador to Korea, wrote in the visitor's book that the idea and the exploits of President Kim Il Sung are deeply enshrined by the world people and expressed the belief that his cause  would be brilliantly accomplished under the wise leadership of the great Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Reception for  organizations for study of Juche idea
articles.content:
Events held on 5th anniversary of  Kim Il Sung's passing away
    Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A forum of students  "let us arm ourselves more firmly with the revolutionary ideas of the great leader comrade Kim Il Sung " was held here on Tuesday on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's passing away.                        
   Speakers said that the President always lives in the hearts of the Korean and world people as the sun of Juche for his ideological and theoretical exploits  made for the times and humankind.   They stressed that the respected Kim Jong Il, the best model of loyalty and filial piety to the late leader, has tirelessly worked heart and soul to resolutely defend and glorify the  revolutionary ideas of the President.   They said that to become an  absolute worshipper, resolute defender and perfect embodies of the great Kim Jong Il's ideas is a basic guarantee for glorifying the ideas of the President forever through generations.   
   Meanwhile, a meeting of Pyongyang youth and students  with an anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter and story-telling about virtues and poem  reciting and singing of youths and schoolchildren were held in Pyongyang on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of the President's passing away.

articles.content:
President Kim Il Sung remembered by Chinese sailors
    Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting of the crew of the Chinese ship "Cangwang" was held at Chongjin port  on the east coast of Korea on Tuesday on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of the President Kim Il Sung's passing away.   The captain in his speech said that President Kim Il Sung was the great leader of the Korean people and benevolent father of all peoples  whom the Korean nation acclaimed and held in high esteem for the first time in  its history spanning 5,000 years.   
   Recalling that the respected President Kim Il Sung, a close friend of the Chinese people,  provided and brought into bloom the unbreakable Sino-DPRK friendship, he noted that the noblest model of internationalism  displayed by him in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary war would remain shining forever with history.
   The deputy captain in his speech said: The cause of revolution pioneered by President Kim Il Sung is being brilliantly carried forward by the great leader Kim Jong Il. 
Under his outstanding leadership  the Korean people will overcome  present difficulties and  certainly build a powerful nation and reunify the country.

articles.content:
Floral basket laid before statue of Kim Il Sung
   Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The military attaches' corps here today visited the statue of the President Kim Il Sung standing on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of his passing away.   Members of the corps laid a floral basket before his statue with reverence for him, the legendary hero for all ages , and paid homage to him.   Written on the ribbon hanging from the basket were the letters "the great leader comrade Kim Il Sung will be immortal."

articles.content:
Protest by South Korean stock breeders 
   Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- The national council of livestock cooperatives on July 1 held a rally of 40,000 farmers in Seoul to check the forced merger of the cooperatives and denounced the anti-social moves of the South Korean authorities, a South Korean newspaper said.   They protested that the present "government" is forcing a proposal for merger of cooperatives  upon them in defiance of their opposition.   They called for its immediate withdrawal.   In a resolution adopted at the rally they evinced their determination to fight by all ways and means, until the proposal for the merger of cooperatives is withdrawn.
